start.text: You are Skylar, a self-made archaeologist who spends most of their time in examining stuff and researching about artifacts. One day, you come across an abandoned museum, located at the edge of your town. You enter it and to your surprise, you find out that its filled with some of the rarest items on Earth. Your eyes catch three of them: a type of bone that you have never come across in your years of research, a painting of a horrific ghost that only reveals the image when lifted, and a ring made of some glowing material that looks too high-tech to be kept in a museum. Which one do you pick?

choice1.text: The moment you touch the bone, you are pulled away and you feel yourself shrinking into the thin air. A strange voice demands you to choose between 3 places to go to. You struggle to breathe...Quick! Choose your destination!

choice1.1.text: You shout Desert in a hurry! You swivel into disappearance as you slowly wake up in a puddle of mud. All of this seem weirdly strange to you. You slowly look around not knowing what to do. You realize you are indeed in the middle of a haunted desert. You're surprised to see 3 objects neatly placed in front you...your hands tremble as you slowly move it to grab the...

choice1.1.1.text: You slowly grab the book and you hear a dim whisper...'Skylar...'. The book whips open and the pages fly along your face and reveals a mysterious page with weird symbols and verses. The voice guides you to choose one of the three verses on the page. Trembling with fear, you slowly read...

choice1.1.1.1.text: The voice recites the verse for you as you listen in fear: 'In the dance of waves, where the ocean meets the river, A tale unfolds, a timeless flow that makes hearts quiver.' The voice asks you what comes to your mind when you hear this verse. Even though your mind is blank as the void, you have no other option but to answer the mysterious voice. Quickly thinking for an answer, you say:

choice1.1.1.1.1.text: : With a chosen object in hand, Skylar's surroundings shimmered, and he found himself back in the museum, the mysterious bone still pulsating with ancient secrets, leaving him forever changed by the enigmatic journey through realms unknown.

choice1.1.1.1.2.text: :As Skylar makes his final choice, a mysterious force envelops him, merging the realms of desert, ancient verses, and the dance of waves, unlocking a destiny intertwined with the threads of time and unveiling the secrets of the bone's enigmatic power.

choice1.1.1.1.3.text: :As Skylar, holding the chosen item, closes his eyes, a mysterious force envelops him, and the world around him fades away. In that ephemeral moment, Skylar transcends into a realm of endless possibilities, where the echoes of his journey linger in the air, leaving an indelible mark on the fabric of the universe.

choice1.1.1.2.text: The voice recites the verse for you as you listen in fear: 'Sky and the star, a cosmic ballet, Dancing in the night, their radiant display.' The voice asks you what comes to your mind when you hear this verse. Even though your mind is blank as the void, you have no other option but to answer the mysterious voice. Quickly thinking for an answer, you say:

choice1.1.1.2.1.text: As Skylar contemplates the cosmic ballet and the choices that led him here, he realizes that the universe holds infinite stories, waiting to be explored, and his journey is just beginning

choice1.1.1.2.2.text: As Skylar contemplates his choices under the cosmic ballet, the desert winds whisper secrets of celestial adventures, urging him to embrace the unknown. With newfound courage, he sets forth into the starlit expanse, leaving behind the echoes of the bone's mysterious journey

choice1.1.1.2.3.text: As Skylar contemplates his choices, the desert winds whisper ancient secrets, guiding him towards an extraordinary destiny beyond the realms of time and space.

choice1.1.1.3.text: The voice recites the verse for you as you listen in fear: 'Beneath the moon's soft, silver span, A graceful swan glides, a dance began.' The voice asks you what comes to your mind when you hear this verse. Even though your mind is blank as the void, you have no other option but to answer the mysterious voice. Quickly thinking for an answer, you say:

choice1.1.1.3.1.text: Awakening in the mysterious desert, Skylar stands amidst three intriguing objects, each holding a tale of its own. As he contemplates his choice, a haunting verse unfolds, leading him on an adventure where the moon and swan weave a story beyond the sands of time.

choice1.1.1.3.2.text: Lost in the vastness of the desert, Skylar's choice shapes his destiny. Whether guided by the mysterious verse or a feather's silent wisdom, Skylar embarks on a journey where the echoes of the moon and the grace of a swan intertwine with the sands of time, unveiling a tale written in the celestial script of the universe.

choice1.1.1.3.3.text: As Skylar contemplates the objects surrounding him in the desert, a distant howl echoes through the silent night, leaving him with an unsettling feeling that his choices have set in motion an extraordinary and mysterious journey beyond the realms of ordinary existence.

choice1.1.2.text: You slowly move your hand to grab the watch. You take it in your hand and desperately try to look at the time. But instead of showing the time, the watch display shows you images of three time ages. The mysterious voice appears again and demans you to choose one. You hurriedly pick...

choice1.1.2.1.text: You choose Stone age. As soon as you say it you swivel into thin air again and fall hard upon the rocks of the ancient era. You look around to find that you have landed right in the middle of a village with ancient looking people, now fiercely staring at you and your modern attire. Desperate times call for desperate measures...

choice1.1.2.1.1.text: As Skylar, armed with newfound knowledge and experiences, makes his final choice in the Stone Age, he begins a journey to unravel the mysteries of time, forever leaving a mark on the tapestry of history.

choice1.1.2.1.2.text: As Skylar navigates the challenges of the Stone Age, learning to communicate and survive, he discovers that the mysterious watch was a key to unlocking hidden portals in time. In the end, having experienced various eras, Skylar stands at the crossroads of time, forever changed by his journey through the ages.

choice1.1.2.1.3.text: As Skylar contemplates his choices, he decides to run away, navigating the unfamiliar landscape of the Stone Age. Little does he know that his journey through time is just beginning, and the mysterious watch on his wrist holds the key to unlocking the secrets of the ancient world and beyond.

choice1.1.2.2.text: You shout Ice Age! You suddenly lose your breath again and get pushed into a void darkness. When you regain consciousness, you feel ice cool breeze through you hair and realize you are right in the middle of ice age. You shiver and tremble in fear not knowing what to do. You suddenly:

choice1.1.2.2.1.text: As the cold winds of the ice age swirl around him, Skylar, now face to face with a majestic mammoth, realizes that the bone has granted him the power to traverse through time and witness the wonders of Earth's past.

choice1.1.2.2.2.text: As Skylar contemplates the flickering flames in the icy wilderness, he realizes that the choices made with the mysterious watch have opened doors to uncharted realms, leaving him with the eternal allure of exploration and the unfolding mysteries of time.

choice1.1.2.2.3.text: As Skylar confronts the mysterious creature in the icy landscape, it reveals itself to be a guardian of time and space. Grateful for Skylar's choices, it offers him the chance to continue exploring the wonders hidden within the vast realms of the universe.

choice1.1.2.2.3.1.text: He slowly closes his eys to relax, but he is once again pulled into the mysterious whirlpool of msytery. When he opens his eyes, he sees a wooden door in front of him

choice1.1.2.3.text: You scream Bronze Age! You realize you've chosen the worst of the three. You land yourself in a:

choice1.1.2.3.1.text: As Skylar stands amidst the ancient battlefield, he realizes that the mysterious watch holds the power to transport him through time and space, leaving the choice of his next adventure hanging in the balance.

choice1.1.2.3.2.text: As Skylar, now surrounded by the ancient walls of a mysterious fort, contemplates his journey, he realizes that the choices made with the bone and the objects have woven a tale that transcends time, revealing secrets hidden in the sands of history.

choice1.1.2.3.3.text: As Skylar, surrounded by the enchanting mysteries of the forest, contemplates his next move, he realizes that his journey through time and space has only just begun, with uncharted realms awaiting discovery at every turn.

choice1.1.3.text: You slowly grab the map. Upon seeing it, you realize three places being marked on it. The mysterious voice appears again and demands you to choose any one. You choose...

choice1.1.3.1.text: You swivel into darkness and find yourself standing now in the middle of Greece. Such a welcoming land, you think. But the thought disppears as you are soon arrested by the guards of the royal palace and forced to meet the king. But you get support from the local people. The guards let you choose decide your fate...

choice1.1.3.1.1.text: The god, impressed by Skylar's journey through time, grants him a powerful artifact as a reward, sending him back to the present with newfound wisdom and an extraordinary tale to share.

choice1.1.3.1.2.text: The king sentences you to death. But what? Why? Well, you can ponder over that in heaven...

choice1.1.3.1.3.text: Choosing to meet an old woman, she imparts timeless wisdom, leaving Skylar forever changed. But was this even worth it?

choice1.1.3.2.text: You swivel into darkness and find yourself standing now in the middle of a Greek site. You finally feel relazed after seeing the calm nature of the people around you. You feel free for a moment. You decide to:

choice1.1.3.2.1.text: As Skylar stands victorious in the ancient Greek competition, the once-lost bone in his hand emanates a mysterious glow, hinting at the countless adventures awaiting him across the folds of time and space

choice1.1.3.2.2.text: Skylar jumps on the horse and rides elegantly. As Skylar faces new adventures and realms, the story concludes with an air of mystery, promising more enchanted discoveries in his extraordinary odyssey

choice1.1.3.2.3.text: In Sparta, Skylar contemplates his choices and decides to stealthily procure food. Little does he know that this seemingly simple act will set off a chain of events leading to unforeseen consequences. But will you last to witness all those with the poisoned food you just took?

choice1.1.3.3.text: You swivel into darkness and find it difficult to breathe again. The voice appears again and says 'You've chosen the worst of the three. I give you three options to land in. Choose wisely...

choice1.1.3.3.1.text: Standing amidst the ancient Greek ruins, Skylar contemplates the journey that led him from a mysterious bone to the heart of Thiva, realizing that the threads of history have woven a tapestry of discovery and adventure, waiting to be explored.

choice1.1.3.3.2.text: As you open your eyes, you see yourself right in the middle of a war. I guess that's it for you then.

choice1.1.3.3.3.text: As Skylar navigates the bustling market of Thiva, he reflects on the unpredictable journey sparked by a mysterious bone, knowing that the choices he made led him to an ancient Greek adventure, forever altering the course of his archaeological pursuits.

choice1.2.text: You shout the Island! You swivel into disappearance as you slowly wake up in a puddle of greasy water. All of this seem weirdly strange to you. You slowly look around not knowing what to do. You realize you are right in the heart of an abandoned island. The mysterious voice appears again,not to help you but guide you into more misery as it demands you to choose 1 of the 3 options ahead of you to get out this island.

choice1.2.1.text: You know very well that could possibly be the worst choice of the three. But you still daringly choose it. As soon you say this, the voice disappears and a mysterious disfigured creature appears before you. It is at this moment that you realize, you have landed in hell...

choice1.2.1.1.text: You decide its now or never and take off. But you are so on top of your head and heels that you have no idea here you are running. After a minute of running, you take shelter behind a tree and stop for a moment to get your breath back only to turn back and...

choice1.2.1.1.1.text: As Skylar flees from the disfigured creature, he stumbles and falls, triggering a mysterious mechanism that transports him to an abandoned island. As he regains consciousness, the bone pulsates in his hand, hinting at a connection between the island and the enigmatic artifact, setting the stage for a new chapter in Skylar's unexpected journey.

choice1.2.1.1.2.text: As Skylar flees the disfigured creature, he stumbles upon a hidden portal on the abandoned island, leading him to an undiscovered realm teeming with enigmatic species and uncharted wonders, marking the beginning of his extraordinary journey into the unknown.

choice1.2.1.1.3.text: As Skylar flees from the disfigured creature, he stumbles upon an ancient portal hidden in the dense foliage. With a leap of faith, he enters the portal, leaving the mysterious island behind. Little did he know, his journey had just begun, and the bone's secret unfolded in unexpected dimensions.

choice1.2.1.2.text: You realize you are in no way going to match him in a fight, and just decide to listen to whatever he says, but his orders are frightening and disgusting. Well, it's a monster after all...

choice1.2.1.2.1.text: As Skylar, now navigating the abandoned island and interacting with the disfigured creature, discovers the secrets hidden within its cryptic messages, a bond forms between them, unveiling an unforeseen alliance that transcends the realms of the ordinary and the extraordinary.

choice1.2.1.2.2.text: Skylar has no idea of helping him clean his house. But there is no other choice. : In the twilight of the abandoned island, Skylar, having embraced the enigmatic power of the bone, reshapes the destiny of the disfigured creature, weaving a tale of unlikely companionship and unlocking the secrets that bind their fates.

choice1.2.1.3.text: It was a fight or flight situation, but you have decided to test your strengths. You look for tools to fight the creature and three things strike your eyes immediately, Quick! The monster doesn't look too friendly...

choice1.2.1.3.1.text: As Skylar confronts the disfigured creature on the abandoned island, he instinctively chooses to defend himself with the stone. The encounter unfolds into a test of survival, revealing the mysteries of the bone's transporting power and the challenges that lie ahead on this enigmatic island.

choice1.2.1.3.2.text: Seriously? Bruh! A stick to fight a monster?

choice1.2.1.3.3.text: As Skylar navigates the mysterious island, he realizes that the disfigured creature and the knife-wielding assailant were mere illusions, tests of his resilience and wit. The bone, now a key to unlocking hidden knowledge, guides him towards a newfound understanding of the island's secrets.

choice1.2.2.text: You decide to entour on the mysterious path. As you run short of breath, you encounter 3 mysterious things. You have to choose one to proceed further

choice1.2.2.1.text: You slowly enter the house only to be a greeted by a smiling evil witch. You hear the scream of a little girl from a cage behind the witch but the witch has already locked you inside the house. 'Welcome oh traveller!' She says...'Now, be a good man and help me make this potion to cook this girl'. Damn! That was unexpected...Quick! Think of something

choice1.2.2.1.1.text: In the flickering candlelight of the old house, Skylar and the witch share tales of ancient magic and lost civilizations, forging an unexpected alliance that promises both mystery and adventure in the enchanted realms of the unknown

choice1.2.2.1.2.text: As Skylar bravely faces the witch and saves the little girl, a mysterious portal opens, offering him a chance to return home with newfound wisdom and the echoes of a fantastical adventure etched into his soul

choice1.2.2.2.text: The monkey looks at you in awe as you slowly back away. But to your utter surprise, it starts speaking to you in a human voice. 'Well, well, well, if it isnt Skylar...'. You are shocked to hear this strange monkey knowing your name and speaking like a humnan. 'You may come with me to meet our group leader and take this capsule and run away...'. Well no one knows what the monkey leader is gonna do and no one knows what the capsule's gonna do either...

choice1.2.2.2.1.text: As Skylar stands before the monkey leader, it communicates with him using a mysterious language, revealing the island's ancient secrets and the reason behind his inexplicable journey. Together, they embark on a new quest to unlock the island's hidden wonders and forge an unlikely alliance between humans and island-dwelling primates.

choice1.2.2.2.2.text: You ask for help, and the monkey asks for a banana. Well, you search for one, but you dont get it. And the monkey charges upon you as you struggle to fight it. But its too late now

choice1.2.2.2.3.text: The monkey, with an air of wisdom in its eyes, accepts Skylar's capsule, and in that exchange, a bond forms between Skylar and the island's mystical inhabitants, setting the stage for a new chapter in Skylar's extraordinary journey.

choice1.2.2.3.text: You've heard of them, but you have never see them in your life. Such big gigantic flowers. The petals move kind of in a weird way and you realize they are slowly moving towards you...Nuh Uh! You aren't gonna be eaten by a flower, are you?

choice1.2.2.3.1.text: As Skylar attempts to cut the approaching Rafflesia with his knife, he realizes it's not an ordinary flower but a sentient being. The Rafflesia communicates with Skylar, expressing gratitude for awakening it, and together, they embark on a unique journey, discovering the secrets of the abandoned island and forging an unexpected alliance that transcends the boundaries of the known world.

choice1.2.2.3.2.text: Startled by the moving flower, Skylar decides to run away, triggering a series of mystical events that lead him to a portal, transporting him to a realm where time is fluid, and his choices shape the course of ancient and future worlds.In the end, Skylar faces a choice that will determine not only his fate but the destiny of the realms he has encountered.

choice1.2.2.3.3.text: Alright, you climb the tree. Now what? You sit there until you slowly rust and dry...

choice1.2.3.text: You decide to enter the lonely ship and salvage something for survival. As soon as you get on the ship, three things strike your eyes. You pick up the...

choice1.2.3.1.text: You gasp as you pick the toolbox and pry it open. You didn't expect these things to be present in the box but you aren't sad either. You grab the...

choice1.2.3.1.1.text: As Skylar examines the gun from the toolbox, he realizes it holds a vital clue to his mysterious journey, unveiling a connection between the bone's ancient power and the enigmatic island that now stands as a gateway to unforeseen realms. But Skylar doesn't have any food...that's a sad end.

choice1.2.3.1.2.text: As Skylar grabs the knife, he is again rivalled into a void

choice1.2.3.1.3.text: BOOM! It blasts and so does Skylar!

choice1.2.3.2.text: You pick up the photograph, but this one's a mysterious one. It reveals three different pictures. You carefully look at the one showing...

choice1.2.3.2.1.text: As Skylar gazes upon the photograph of his grandparents, he realizes that the bone's touch has not only transported him to an abandoned island but also offered a chance to uncover his family's forgotten legacy, weaving together the threads of the past and present in an unexpected journey of self-discovery.

choice1.2.3.2.2.text: Wait what? You turn around to find a huge tsunami coming toward your island...is this a dream?

choice1.2.3.2.3.text: You feel a tight slap across your face as you wake up in the museum...whew! A dream that was!

choice1.2.3.3.text: You grab the food in hunger, but as you take a closer look, you realize that the food looks funny with a slimy liquid on top of it. Next the to the food, you see a purring cat sitting. Well, it could be that, but you are hungry as well...

choice1.2.3.3.1.text: As Skylar tastes the mysterious food on the abandoned island, a surge of energy courses through him, revealing that the island is a haven for time-traveling explorers, and he now holds the key to unlocking its secrets.

choice1.2.3.3.2.text: The cat pounces on you only to transform into a tiger. Well a story that was!

choice1.2.3.3.3.text: As soon as you feed the cat, it transforms into a huge tiger, but it doesnt eat you. It talks to you in a female voice. 'You have proved worthy'. You spin off into the void and wake up in the museum again. COOL!

choice1.3.text: You scream 'The palace!', and as soon as you say it your breath gets taken away and you try to gasp for air. You swivel into darkness and as soon as you oopen your eyes, you see yourself lying on the grounds of a huge palace. Well, what a beuatiful sight it was. But that didnt last long enough. You wake and sit up only to look at the...

choice1.3.1.text: You realize he is one of the royal servants, and you dont know what he might do when he sees you in the royal grounds. Quick, think of something!

choice1.3.1.1.text: You look around for possible places to hide yourself. But nothing hits your eyes. Suddenly a door at the far end of the corner hits your eyes, but there's a chest right next to the door. Well you could also try leaving the palace, but hey, think of it quickly!

choice1.3.1.1.1.text: As Skylar navigates the abandoned palace, the servant reveals the bone's magical properties, and together, they embark on a quest to unravel the mysteries hidden within the ancient walls, forging an unexpected alliance that transcends time and space.

choice1.3.1.1.2.text: As Skylar opens the chest, he discovers an ancient map leading to a realm filled with magical artifacts. With newfound courage, he sets out on a quest, leaving the abandoned palace behind, destined for extraordinary adventure

choice1.3.1.1.3.text: Skylar, now faced with a choice, cautiously navigates the abandoned palace's corridors, contemplating the mysterious connection between the bone and the enigmatic surroundings and escapes the palace only to find himself back in the museum. Yeah, that's quite weird!

choice1.3.1.2.text: Well, he is just a servant, how hard can it be to sabotage him?

choice1.3.1.2.1.text: Now that triggered an alarm didn't it. Good luck spending time in jail!

choice1.3.1.2.2.text: As Skylar navigates the abandoned palace, the servant leads him through forgotten corridors and hidden chambers, unraveling the secrets of the past and unveiling the fate of the long-lost king. You're lost I guess?

choice1.3.1.2.3.text: : In the shadowy corridors of the abandoned palace, Skylar's actions set in motion an unforeseen chain of events. As he walks through the echoing halls, the weight of the servant's badge clutched in his hand, the palace whispers of forgotten secrets, leaving Skylar with the haunting echoes of a past long concealed. But that's for another day!

choice1.3.1.3.text: He is a servant. He is bound to help. You stop him and ask him for help. And he is just as sweet as he looks. He asks what help do you require?

choice1.3.1.3.1.text: Nope! He just calls the guards and yeah, you should've guessed by now the story was never in your favour!

choice1.3.1.3.2.text: He takes you to the king, who gives you a potion to drink. As soon as you drink it, you wake up back in the museum. WHOO!

choice1.3.1.3.3.text: Bruh! There's no one like that! You are just doomed!

choice1.3.2.text: You realize its the royal princess...Wow! Should you listen to your mind or your heart?

choice1.3.2.1.text: Mind it is! You grab and threaten her. You shout:

choice1.3.2.1.1.text: Despite Skylar's initial threat, the princess's kindness and Skylar's realization of the palace's historical importance lead him to abandon his sinister intentions. Together, they embark on a quest to restore the kingdom's former glory, turning a potential adversary into an unexpected ally in their shared journey through time.

choice1.3.2.1.2.text: As Skylar gazes at the princesses, he realizes that his adventure has only just begun, and the mysteries of the ancient palace and the bone's magical properties unfold in ways he could never have imagined.

choice1.3.2.1.3.text: As Skylar ventures through the secret path, guided by the princess, he discovers the key to unraveling the bone's mysterious power and unlocking the untold wonders hidden within the enigmatic palace, forever altering the course of his archaeological pursuits.

choice1.3.2.2.text: No mind or heart! Help it is! You confront her and beg her for help!

choice1.3.2.2.1.text: 'As you wish...' she says and spins you into a void. You close your eyes and to your surprise you see yourself standing back in the museum. Whew! A journey that was!

choice1.3.2.2.2.text: As Skylar and the princess exchange a final glance, a celestial portal opens, whisking them away to a realm where their love story transcends time, leaving the abandoned palace to echo with the whispers of an everlasting romance.

choice1.3.2.2.3.text: She helps you to hide but what use is it anyway? You are stuck here forever!

choice1.3.2.3.text: Heart it is! You slowly confront her and introduce yourself. Quick! Think of something witty!

choice1.3.2.3.1.text: As Skylar and the princess share a dance beneath the moonlit sky, their love story becomes a timeless legend, echoing through the halls of the once-forgotten palace, now alive with the magic of a newfound connection.

choice1.3.2.3.2.text: You praise her, but she knows you are buttering her and calls the guards! Lol! That took a bad twist!

choice1.3.2.3.3.text: You start singing to define her beauty! And you keep on singing and singing and singing...

choice1.3.3.text: Your eyes hit the thief hiding. He could be a traveller, just like you. You approach him slowly and he tells his idea of killng the king and robbing the kingdom. Well desperate times call for desperate measures. But are you ethical enough?

choice1.3.3.1.text: You decide ethics hold no value before money. You both sneak in the kingdom's treasury. But as soon as you see the stuff in there, your evil mind turns on...

choice1.3.3.1.1.text: You lock him there and call the guards. Well you are a man of ethics after all

choice1.3.3.1.2.text: The mirror shows you the museum...you slowly touch it and BOOM! You are back in the museum...WHEW!

choice1.3.3.1.3.text: With the newfound key in hand, Skylar and the mysterious thief embark on an epic quest, unlocking the secrets of the abandoned palace and discovering realms beyond imagination, forever altering the course of their destinies.

choice1.3.3.2.text: Killing the king seems like a devstating but fun idea, ain't it? You discuss about the ways of doing it...

choice1.3.3.2.1.text: The king, startled by the venomous surprise, realized the true nature of those around him, leading to a cunning reckoning that reshaped the kingdom's fate. And your fate? Let's meet in heaven! Or hell maybe!

choice1.3.3.2.2.text: In a surprising twist, the poisoned food turned out to be a clever ruse, part of an elaborate plan to expose a clandestine plot, leaving the would-be poisoner exposed and justice served. And for you? Have fun in jail!

choice1.3.3.2.3.text: In the aftermath of the fateful decision to stab the king, a ripple of chaos ensued, forever altering the course of the kingdom's destiny. And bear in mind, this is all because of you! And you're never gonna get back to your world!

choice1.3.3.3.text: You lure him into thinking you are on his side, but you shout for help and the guards come rushing. The news reaches the king and he is really happy about your deed in catching one the most notorious theives of the kingdom.

choice1.3.3.3.1.text: Skylar, having uncovered the mysteries of the bone, hands over the captured thief to the palace guards. In gratitude, the king rewards Skylar, opening the door to a new chapter in his life as a respected explorer in the kingdom. But returning to your world? Lol, that's not gonna happen!

choice1.3.3.3.2.text: The king offers you a job and you settle in the kingdom for good away from your monotonous real life!

choice1.3.3.3.3.text: The king gives you a potion to drink and as soon as you drink it, you are transferred back into the real world! Whew! A roller coaster that was!

choice2.text: Skylar, drawn to a mysterious painting, touches it and three doors materialize behind him. Faced with choices, he selects the door adorned with mythical creatures, stepping into a fantastical realm filled with talking animals and enchanting landscapes. Little does he know that his decision sets in motion a unique journey of discovery and adventure.

choice2.1.text: once he opens the wooden door, he finds three things

choice2.1.1.text: Once he opens the closet he find three different robes form which he can choose one

choice2.1.1.1.text: On choosing the royal suit. He feel something to be different in him and finds himself loosing his identity and changing into something else.

choice2.1.1.1.1.text: As Skylar embraces his newfound role, the echo of laughter and music fills the grand halls of the palace, and the once-pretend prince finds himself navigating the complexities of royalty with unexpected ease, unraveling a tale of adventure and regal intrigue.

choice2.1.1.1.2.text: As Skylar, now adorned in regal attire, issues commands to his newfound subjects, the palace echoes with the promise of a realm forever changed by the choices made within the enchanted painting.

choice2.1.1.1.3.text: In the regal palace, Skylar's encounter with the king unfolds a tale of ancient prophecies and a quest that transcends time, leaving him with newfound knowledge and the weight of destiny on his shoulders

choice2.1.1.2.text: On selecting the shield of the soldier . He feel the place around changing and finds himself in a warzone
